answerText: Zadig[10] Zadig was written by this author, who also wrote about a giant who visits earth from the Sirius system in Micromegas.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Penn and Wake Forest | 6 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The title character becomes the slave of Setoc, but is freed when Setoc marries Almona. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play about a Babylonian philosopher, who ascends to the throne and marries Astarte after passing a series of challenges.
